description:
The course is guided by the IB Maths Studies SL syllabus. It focuses on the minimum requirements that the student needs to excel on her/his studies. If you want to excel on your studies without learning extra information, this course is for you.

Additionally, I have added lectures about all the material that a student is expected to know before starting the course. Therefore this course is a great way of reminding yourself or learning what you are expected to know prior to starting the IB Maths Studies course.


Pre_requisite

  • Basic knowledge of mathematic operation. That is, students are expected to know addition, subtraction, multiplication and division of whole numbers.
  • You just need you pen and paper and a positive attitude to complete the course.
title: IB Mathematical Studies SL
